channel.title: ZBrush on 某些人
channel.description: Recent content in ZBrush on 某些人

item.title: ZBrush2020
item.description: ZBrush2020升级 Pixologic is pleased to announce the release of ZBrush 2020! This new version enables artists with greater sculpting flexibility via powerful additions to the award winning brush system, as well as significant enhancements in a number of other areas. 2019-11-13 New Feature Highlights XTractor Brushes - Convert detail from your model into a new alpha or texture for reuse elsewhere. HistoryRecall Brush - Project a model’s Undo History to another model regardless of topology differences.
